text: jo ko'i kura'ana (akasi vani) dvara parvato calavavamam avata athava dharatina tukade tukada kari devamam avati athava mrtako sathe vartalapa karavi devamam avato (to pana te'o imana na lavata). Vata e che ke dareka karya allahana ja hathamam che, to sum imanavala'one a vata para visvasa nathi ke jo allaha ta'ala icche to dareka lokone satya margadarsana api de, inkara karanara'one to temana inkarana badalamam hammesa ko'ine ko'i sakhata saja pahoncati rahese athava temana makanoni najika avati rahese, tyam sudhi ke nakki karela samaya avi jaya, kharekhara allaha ta'ala vacanabhanga nathi karato
